promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive special lion grass-type with golden claws. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or grass:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glitereon, a massive special lion grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: spore. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word lion or grass or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, lion-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sunlight ray ambience
generatedDescription: A wise guardian of the wild, Glitereon shines brightly to ward off intruders. Its mysterious spore defends its home from all.
